title: Crime Alert  08.14.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert  08.14.18
description:
Paul Manafort stands accused of sending large sums of money through foreign banks. Is that a crime? The search is on for the person who shot a mother in the drive-thru. Drama at Kylie Jenners' birthday party brings the police.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
